field.name: NAME

field.name: DESCRIPTION
field.value: #ID# - User ID #LOGIN# - Login #URL_LOGIN# - Encoded login for use in URL #EMAIL# - EMail #NAME# - Name #LAST_NAME# - Last Name #PASSWORD# - User password #CHECKWORD# - Password check string #XML_ID# - User ID to link with external data sources
